document.full_text: dallas mavericks head coach rick carlisle praised german giant dirk nowitzki for playing through the pain barrier and leading his team to a 95-93 comeback win at the miami heat in game two of the nba finals on thursday.
document.title: nowitzki refuses to linger on finger as mavs tie series
lines_and_colors: dallas mavericks head coach rick carlisle praised german giant dirk nowitzki for playing through the pain barrier and leading his team to a 95-93 comeback win at the miami heat in game two of the nba finals on thursday.
